tokens.resolved_gloss: Gad, a son of Jacob, including his tribe and its territory; also a prophet

tokens.resolved_gloss: he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
